attributes.action: Not pay any bonus to RBS staff this year and if the board resign not to pay any severance money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the prime minister as the share holder with 84% of the stock of RBS to ensure that the board do not pay any bonus to RBS staff this year.
If the board resign over this issue they should not get any severance package.
If staff find other jobs then they must be held to their contractual terms i.e. they must serve out their contract and notice period. We will see how many can get jobs elsewhere and if they flood the market then the going rate will actually decrease ( a benefit to all of the ordinary working people).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
